location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Government of Bahrain Annual Report for Year 1365 (December 1945 - November 1946)'

physicalDescription.extent: Includes an index and list of illustrations on folio 29.

mods.abstract: Includes a 'General Review' by Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, on folio 31. Includes photographic illustrations, graphs, and a plan entitled 'Custom Square Scheme Showing Proposed Building Sites' on folio 81. Some manuscript annotations.
